price: Dir-se-Ihes-á: "Comei e bebei, com deleite, pelo que adiantastes nos dias passados."
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā aslaftum fī al-ayāmi al-khāliyati
